components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: Customers May Experience Issues Trying to Login Into Twilio Console

incident_updates.body: We are investigating a service problem trying to login into Twilio Console. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: DEVELOPER TOOLS - Console

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue logging into Twilio Console. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures to Syriatel in Syria

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing SMS delivery failures sending to Syriatel in Syria. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE MESSAGING - SMS

scheduled_maintenances.name: Bangladesh SMS Carrier Maintenance - Robi

incident_updates.body:
The Robi network in Bangladesh is conducting an emergency maintenance from 21 August 2025 at 14:00 PDT until 21 August 2025 at 16:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Robi Bangladesh handsets.

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, APAC

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States SMS and MMS Carrier Maintenance - T-Mobile

incident_updates.body: The T-Mobile network in the United States is conducting a planned maintenance from 21 August 2025 at 22:00 PDT until 22 August 2025 at 02:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from T-Mobile United States handsets when sending via long codes and short codes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our SMS carrier partner in the United States is conducting an emergency maintenance from 22 August 2025 at 01:00 PDT until 22 August 2025 at 04:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to AT&T United States handsets via subset of United States short codes.

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Multiple Destination SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in Qatar, Jordan, Kosovo, Tunisia, Oman, Libya, Morocco, Yemen and Turkey is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 August 2025 at 15:00 PDT until 24 August 2025 at 19:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Qatar, Jordan, Kosovo, Tunisia, Oman, Libya, Morocco, Yemen and Turkey handsets.

The XL Axiata network in Indonesia is conducting an emergency maintenance from 21 August 2025 at 11:00 PDT until 21 August 2025 at 13:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to XL Axiata Indonesia handsets.

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 04 August 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 27 August 2025 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

04 August 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 04 August 2025 at 17:00 PDT
06 August 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 06 August 2025 at 17:00 PDT
11 August 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 11 August 2025 at 17:00 PDT
13 August 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 13 August 2025 at 17:00 PDT
18 August 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 18 August 2025 at 17:00 PDT
20 August 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 20 August 2025 at 17:00 PDT
25 August 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 25 August 2025 at 17:00 PDT
27 August 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 27 August 2025 at 17:00 PDT
